summary: PHP/NodeJS full-stack developer with a BA in Economics and Management from Ariel University. Analytical, motivated, and results-driven. Experienced in front-end and back-end development, CMS (WordPress), Linux/Windows environments, and e-commerce projects. Seeking a challenging development role involving advanced technologies.

experience.title: Developer and Coordinator
experience.description: Development and maintenance of the website alternative.help; client-side logic for applying/submitting forms (JS, AJAX, PHP); creation of a content management portal and implemented admin Russian interface for the MySQL database; project construction, management and representation; conducted job interviews for professionals and volunteers.

experience.title: Full-stack Developer
experience.description: Front-end and back-end development (HTML, CSS(SASS), JavaScript ES6+; PHP 7+ (Laravel), NodeJS, Bash); React, Express, JQuery; Developed e-commerce website (both back-end and front-end); Maintained WordPress projects; Webpack; CMS WordPress integration; Databases MariaDB/MySQL, MongoDB; Git (Github, Bitbucket); CSS3(SCSS), Bootstrap; Linux/Windows; misrot.com project.
